00001 #ifndef DAQ_LOOP
00002 #define DAQ_LOOP
00003 
00004 #ifndef LOOP_USLEEP_TIME
00006 #define LOOP_USLEEP_TIME 100
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 
00019 
00020 template<typename T>
00021 inline int sample_data_buffer(cimg_library::CImgList<T>& data, void *map, DAQdevice& DAQdev, bool control=false)
00022 {
00023   std::cerr<<__func__<<"\n"<<std::flush;
00024   int ret; // return of function
00025   int front = 0; // address of mapped buffer
00026   int back = 0;  //
00027   int sample_count = 0; // number of samples stored in one channel
00028   int sampling_complete_flag=0;
00029 
00030   int size=DAQdev.bufsize;
00031   int sample_number=DAQdev.sample_number;
00032   int channel_number=DAQdev.channel_index.size();
00033 
00034   std::cout<<"LOOP_USLEEP_TIME = "<<LOOP_USLEEP_TIME<<std::endl;
00035 
00036   // sampling loop begins
00037   while(1)
00038     {
00039       // get the number of bytes available in the streaming buffer.
00040       front += comedi_get_buffer_contents(DAQdev.dev, DAQdev.subdevice);
00041       
00042       // when the buffer is not updated, wait time specified by LOOP_USLEEP_TIME
00043       if(front == back)
00044         {
00045           usleep(LOOP_USLEEP_TIME);
00046           continue;
00047         }
00048       // read available buffer (from back to front)
00049       int col = 0;
00050       for(int i = back; i < front; i += sizeof(sampl_t))
00051         {
00052           if (DAQdev.verbose)std::cout<<"front="<<front<<",back="<<back<<",index="<<i<<",value"<<*(sampl_t *)(map + (i % size))<<std::endl;
00053           data[col](sample_count)=*(sampl_t *)(map + (i % size)); // read the contents of the memory directly and convert it into sampl_t type, which is actually integer.
00054           col++;
00055           if(col == channel_number)
00056             { 
00057               col = 0; //re-initialize col when one series of scan is finished  
00058               sample_count++;   
00059               if(sample_count==sample_number) sampling_complete_flag=1; //sampling should be stopped when the sample_count reaches to the total number of sample
00060             }
00061           if(sampling_complete_flag==1) break;
00062         }
00063 
00064       // mark the position where the program has already read. refer to the comedi lib manual for further info
00065       ret = comedi_mark_buffer_read(DAQdev.dev, DAQdev.subdevice, front - back);
00066       if(ret < 0){comedi_perror("comedi_mark_buffer_read"); break;}
00067         
00068       // "front" of this time becomes "back" for next time.
00069       back = front;
00070     
00071       // exit while loop
00072       if(sampling_complete_flag) break;
00073     
00074     }//sampling loop
00075  
00076 
00077 
00078  
00079   return 0;
00080 }
00081 
00082 template<typename T>
00083 inline int sample_data_point(cimg_library::CImgList<T>& data, DAQdevice& DAQdev, bool control=false)
00084 {
00085  std::cerr<<__func__<<"\n"<<std::flush;
00086  int sample_number=DAQdev.sample_number;
00087  int channel_number=DAQdev.channel_index.size();
00088  
00089  RT_preempt RT;
00090 // Initialization administration RT  
00091  RT.initialization(DAQdev.sampling_rate);
00092 lsampl_t value = 99;
00093 for(int i=0;i< sample_number;++i)
00094 {
00095   // sleep of a nanosecond
00096   RT.nanowait();
00097 //acquire 1 point for all channels
00098 for(int channel=0;channel<channel_number; ++channel)
00099 {
00101 comedi_data_read_delayed(DAQdev.dev, DAQdev.subdevice, DAQdev.channel_index[channel]/*channel*/,0/*range*/,0/*aref*/,&value,1);
00102 data[channel](i)=value;
00103 
00104 }//channel loop
00105 
00106 // computation of the next time interval in a deterministic way: 50 microsec)
00107   RT.next_time_interval();
00108   
00109 
00110  }//i loop
00111 
00112  return 0;
00113 }
